modelFlowPaths.title: Model FlowPaths
modelFlowPaths.name: Federal Emergency Management Agency
modelFlowPaths.description: A spatial data set consisting of lines showing the flow path used for floodplain modelling and mapping.

baseFloodElev.title: Base Flood Elevation
baseFloodElev.name: Federal Emergency Management Agency
baseFloodElev.description: Location and attributes for base flood elevations lines shown on the FIRM

firmPanels.title: Firm Panels
firmPanels.name: Federal Emergency Management Agency
firmPanels.description: Official map of a community on which FEMA has delineated the Special Flood Hazard Areas (SFHAs), the Base Flood Elevations (BFEs) and the risk premium zones applicable to the community

LOMR.title: LOMR
LOMR.name: Federal Emergency Management Agency
LOMR.description: An official amendment to the currently effective FEMA map. It is issued by FEMA and changes flood zones, delineations and elevations

yrZones100.title: 100 Year Flood Zones
yrZones100.name: Federal Emergency Management Agency
yrZones100.description: All Zone comprising the 1% annual chance flood otherwise referred to as the “Base Flood” or “100 year flood”. (Zones A, AE, AO, AH) without Floodway

yrZones500.title: 500 Year Flood Zones
yrZones500.name: Federal Emergency Management Agency
yrZones500.description: All Zone X, 0.2% annual chance flood otherwise referred to as “500 year flood”

zoneXFuture.title: Zone X Future Conditions
zoneXFuture.name: Federal Emergency Management Agency
zoneXFuture.description: Zone X Future Conditions of possible flood zones

zoneXLess1Foot.title: Zone X Area of Minimal Flood Hazard
zoneXLess1Foot.name: Federal Emergency Management Agency
zoneXLess1Foot.description: Areas determined to be outside the 1% and 0.2% annual chance floodplains

zoneXLevee.title: Zone X Levee
zoneXLevee.name: Federal Emergency Management Agency
zoneXLevee.description: Zone X areas with reduced flood risk due to levee.
